mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANNOUNCEMENT (ID, ADMIN_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_TITLE, ANNOUNCEMENT_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_ANNOUNCEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{adminId}, #{announcementCategoryId}, #{announcementTitle}, #{announcementContent})
mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM, ID, ADMIN_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_TITLE, ANNOUNCEMENT_CONTENT, ANNOUNCEMENT_DATE, ANNOUNCEMENT_VIEW_COUNT, ANNOUNCEMENT_LIKE_COUNT, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_NAME, APARTMENT_ID, ADMIN_IDENTIFICATION FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, ID, ADMIN_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_TITLE, ANNOUNCEMENT_CONTENT, ANNOUNCEMENT_DATE, ANNOUNCEMENT_VIEW_COUNT, ANNOUNCEMENT_LIKE_COUNT, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_NAME, APARTMENT_ID, ADMIN_IDENTIFICATION FROM ( SELECT A.ID, ADMIN_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_ID, ANNOUNCEMENT_TITLE, ANNOUNCEMENT_CONTENT, ANNOUNCEMENT_DATE, ANNOUNCEMENT_VIEW_COUNT, ANNOUNCEMENT_LIKE_COUNT, ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_NAME, APARTMENT_ID, ADMIN_IDENTIFICATION FROM TBL_ANNOUNCEMENT A JOIN TBL_ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY C ON ANNOUNCEMENT_CATEGORY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_ADMIN D ON D.ID = A.ADMIN_ID ORDER BY ID DESC ) P1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} ) P2 WHERE P2.R >= #{pagination.startRow}
